name: Name:
name-tooltip: The name of the folder, not that difficult.
icon-tooltip:
A link to an image (Supported formats)
It also supports data:image/{type};base64, format (Convert image to data strings)
Thread with some icons.
You can click the icon of the Docker/VM to set the folder icon.
preview-tooltip: The preview type, not that difficult.
preview-hover-tooltip: Will make the preview only show when mouse is hovering over.
preview-update-tooltip: Will make the name of the container in the preview orange if an update is available.
preview-grayscale-tooltip: Will make the preview icons grayscaled.
preview-webui-tooltip: Will add a little globe icon that opens the webUI.
preview-logs-tooltip: Will add a little log icon that opens the log menu.
preview-console-tooltip: Will add a little console icon that opens the console window.
preview-vertical-bars-tooltip: Will Show vertical bars between container/VM inside the folder preview.
context-tooltip: Will show the preview context type you choose.
context-trigger-tooltip: How the advanced preview will be shown.
context-graph-time-tooltip: Time frame for the graph(s) in seconds.
border-tooltip: Will Show a border on the preview box.
border-color: Preview border and vertical bars color:
border-color-tooltip:
Will make the preview border and vertical bars a specific color.
The button will set the color to the current font color.
update-column-tooltip: Will NUKE the update column for this folder.
expand-tab-tooltip: Will make the folder start expanded on the Docker/VMs tab.
expand-dashboard-tooltip: Will make the folder start expanded on the Dashboard.
regex-tooltip:
Regex... Lasciate ogne speranza, voi ch'intrate
Any container name the regex matches will be added to folder.
Example for adding pterodactyl egg: [0-9a-zA-Z]{8}-[0-9a-zA-Z]{4}-[0-9a-zA-Z]{4}-[0-9a-zA-Z]{4}-[0-9a-zA-Z]{12}.
Site for testing your regex.
When you edit the regex anything selected manually will be deselected.
order-tooltip: Drag and drop to make your desired order, if you edit the regex the selection will be deselected.
custom-actions-folder-tooltip:
Name: Just the name of the action.
Type: Type of the action.
  • Standard - normal action on docker containers (start, stop, ...).
  • Custom - will execute a User Scripts (User Scripts plugin required).
Action: Action to be performed.
  • Cycle - cycle between two states.
  • Set - set a state.
  • Restart - basic restart.
Containers: A comma (,) separated list of containers.
Script: Just the name of the script (Names are case sensitive and need white spaces).
Sync: Whether to run the script in background or not.
custom-action: Add a custom action
custom-action-tooltip: Lets you perform custom action on the folder.
default-action-tooltip: Will remove the default action button like start, stop and restart from the folder context menu.
folderview-desc: FolderView lets you create folders for grouping Dockers and VMs together to help with organization. Especially useful if you're using docker-compose. Getting Started: A new button named "Add Folder" will appear at the bottom of the docker/VM tab next to "Add Container/VM".
preview-text-width-tooltip:
Will limit the width of the name of the container in the preview.
For example 12px, 1rem (Check this for more units).
Leave it blank and there is no limit.
